messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-FluxExt-MZ?
ComfyUI-FluxExt-MZ is an extension that provides tool nodes related to flux1 in ComfyUI.
What does the MZ_Flux1UnetLoader_cpuDynOffload node do?
The MZ_Flux1UnetLoader_cpuDynOffload node is a UNET loader for flux1 that dynamically loads and unloads from CUDA.
Which repository does the MZ_Flux1CheckpointLoaderNF4_cpuDynOffload node depend on?
The MZ_Flux1CheckpointLoaderNF4_cpuDynOffload node depends on the https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI_bitsandbytes_NF4 repository.
What is the function of the MZ_Flux1CheckpointLoader_cpuDynOffload node?
The MZ_Flux1CheckpointLoader_cpuDynOffload node is a Checkpoint loader for flux1 that dynamically loads and unloads from CUDA.
What does the MZ_Flux1PartialLoad_Patch node do?
The MZ_Flux1PartialLoad_Patch node dynamically loads and unloads from CUDA to alleviate insufficient GPU memory. However, it may have bugs after running and modifying parameters.
